metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24407 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - high.
metadata.Description:
In Cyrus SASL 2.1.17 through 2.1.27 before 2.1.28, plugins/sql.c does not escape the password for a SQL INSERT or UPDATE statement.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-24407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsasl2-2 - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
libsasl2-modules - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
libsasl2-modules-db - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
libsasl2-modules-gssapi-heimdal - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
libsasl2-modules-gssapi-mit - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
libsasl2-modules-ldap - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
libsasl2-modules-otp - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
libsasl2-modules-sql - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
sasl2-bin - 2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cyrus-sasl2 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.27+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1').
